name: BaseButton

members.name: id
members.description: A unique identifier for the button

members.name: url
members.description: A destination to link to, rendered in the href attribute of a link

members.name: external
members.description: Forces url to open in a new tab

members.name: download
members.description: Tells the browser to download the url instead of opening it. Provides a hint for the downloaded filename if it is a string value

members.name: submit
members.description: Allows the button to submit a form

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables the button, disallowing merchant interaction

members.name: loading
members.description: Replaces button text with a spinner while a background action is being performed

members.name: pressed
members.description: Sets the button in a pressed state

members.name: accessibilityLabel
members.description: Visually hidden text for screen readers

members.name: role
members.description: A valid WAI-ARIA role to define the semantic value of this element

members.name: ariaControls
members.description: Id of the element the button controls

members.name: ariaExpanded
members.description: Tells screen reader the controlled element is expanded

members.name: ariaDescribedBy
members.description: Indicates the ID of the element that describes the button

members.name: ariaChecked
members.description: Indicates the current checked state of the button when acting as a toggle or switch
